products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush Plum Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. This means they utilize fabric technology that keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer by absorbing heat from sunlight. This makes them an excellent choice for those who are looking for energy efficient and energy saving blinds. Featured here in their plum colour - perfect for those wanting to introduce some sophisticated colour into their room.

products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush Plum Solar/thermal Pleated Blind
products.description: Product id: sdb-plf0195 fabric colour: plum material: 100% polyester headrail: aluminium headrail - wide colour options available control type: cord energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes mirabella solar crush plum solar/thermal pleated blind in purple. Made to measure from 41. 78 with free uk mainland delivery. This solar/thermal pleated blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
